Create message describing study summary for Report

Source: R/Report_OverviewText.R
Report_OverviewText.Rd

`r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

Usage

Report_OverviewText(lSetup, dfResults, lStudy)

Arguments

lSetup

`list` that is produced by `Report_StudyInfo()`.

dfResults

`data.frame` A stacked summary of analysis pipeline output. Created by passing a list of results returned by [Summarize()] to [BindResults()]. Expected columns: `GroupID`, `GroupLevel`, `Numerator`, `Denominator`, `Metric`, `Score`, `Flag`, `MetricID`, `StudyID`, `SnapshotDate`.

lStudy

`list` contains study-level metadata.

On this page
